forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
